Reviews.Title: LOVED it, at first!
Reviews.Author: Dana
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for over a year now.  When I first got it, I loved it!  I wanted the qwerty keyboard, and going from a 'regular' cell phone without the keyboard to this, was fabulous!  In the beginning, it was easy to text (compared to the 'other' way), but I started to realize it was missing letters in the texts.  For example; I would type 'momma' and it would type 'oma'.  So you have to go back and add the missing letters.  Sometimes when you go back and type the absent letters, it would type two letters in its place, seeming like they were in the queue from the last time it was pressed.  Now, instead of being 'oma' it would be 'mmmoma'.As mentioned in a lot of other reviews, sometimes the text messages don't send (or receive) without turning the phone off and back on.  This is certainly an inconvenience, especially if you don't know you were receiving a text.  When you turn the phone back on, it takes a few minutes to find data again.One disappointment is the locking/unlocking button on the right side of the phone.  The placement of this button is really an annoyance.  When you try unlocking it with one hand and as you're holding it, trying to push the button, the screen starts sliding toward the button.  This makes the button go underneath the screen and you have to grab it with the other hand to slide it back together.  This is something you can get used to and master but still a major aggravation in the beginning.  Not to mention when other people need to use your phone and try unlocking it.The lack of apps is another disappointment.  I know this isn't a smart phone and if it is supposed to be, it is clearly lacking in apps and ability to handle data.  If you are looking at this phone for texting or as a cheaper way of having a 'smart phone', I suggest looking at another brand and/or model.  I do  caution on the Samsung brand 'keyboards' though.  With the three samsung phones I've had, the qwerty keyboards all skip or double letters when typing.

Reviews.Title: first touch phone couldn't ask for anything better
Reviews.Author: mcook
Reviews.Content: I was having problems with a phone that was also samsung. It is the only brand I buy because of satisfaction with the phones. I have prepaid thru tmobile and found that any gsm phone will work. This phone is great. I wish the directions were better but the paperwork does give a website to go to and that does tell you what you need to know. I love my phone. It works great and I think it is a good choice for someone who has never had a touch screen before. I do not know what happened with other customers but I swear by Samsung phones. I need the qwerty keyboard because for me the keyboard on the touch screen isn't a good idea because I have tremors. I prefer the qwerty keyboard. I just can't say enough about this phone.

Reviews.Title: Samsung A877
Reviews.Author: hi Desertdrifter
Reviews.Content: Phone working great and very happy with it.  Its just what I wanted and got This my secondtime ordering on line and Amazon really triesto to get things right.

Reviews.Title: Bought two,from separate vendors,returned both
Reviews.Author: DosZap
Reviews.Content: One would not CHARGE any battery(defect in phone).Neither issue Vendors fault.One thing you need to know about NEW Samsung phones,Wherever purchased,or bought online.IF the phone was made 12 months before you purchased it, it has ZERO warranty.IOW buy a NEW model,or you get no warranty from Samsung.(only way to tell for sure is w/phones serial#, and IME #), which no one can give you, as boxes are sealed.Most manufacturers warranties start at IN SERVICE date.Not SAMSUNG.In this regard, they are rated ZERO from me.Phone is new, if it has never been opened or put into service IMHO.Second NEW phone(Impression Deax),came used,sold as NIB.(Vendor could not have known as it was shipped direct from his Vendor to me).Vendors in both cases gave promt refunds and,one paid return UPS.Amazon vendors are great, never had to battle over a return.Or a credit.

Reviews.Title: My Impression - not so great
Reviews.Author: Book Rdr "luvbooks"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone just over a year ago at a bargain basement price of .01 (yes, 1 penny) so I cannot complain about the price, especially since it was a pretty new model at the time.  I wanted the QWERTY keyboard and thought this would be a good starting place for me before investing in a smart phone.However, I found that there were never any software updates done to get rid of the bug that would cause the phone to freeze up while sending texts.Three weeks ago, my screen went dead everytime I slid open the keyboard so I couldn't see what I was typing.  Eventually it came on again for two days, then went back off again.I finally got a new phone today and it is not a Samsung brand.  I was told at the cell store that this is a frequent problem with this phone and it's been happening to a lot of people.  I'd avoid this phone if you want it to work long term.Overall, I liked the phone when it worked right but I wouldn't buy one again and the phone I had made me shy away from investing in another Samsung phone.

Reviews.Title: I love this phone! Thinking of getting another!
Reviews.Author: KarenH
Reviews.Content: I didn't think this phone was available since I haven't seen it at the AT&T; stores.  My contract is up soon and I think I'm just going to buy one on here.  I was so upset when my phone finally died.  It worked great for the longest time!

Reviews.Title: Very Bad: Work Ok for only a Mon / Ear speaker Fail
Reviews.Author: Jose M.
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to THE OEM PLANET, this have a fast shipping, and was received OK on May 15th, the phone work excellent and have very fast response for all the features, but at July 18th this phone fail.The specific fail is a distorting sound (like static) in the ear speaker that not permit me listen and understanding nothing on the call.This is a very bad fail. I Contact The Oem Planet and Amazon Costumer Support and now I are Returning this phone for a full refund.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone.... But Not Great
Reviews.Author: ilajna
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for about two months now.... I like it but it does have a couple annoying problems. Never experienced the problem other reviewers are having, where they need to restart the phone to send a text. HAVE noticed that when you first turn the phone on, you it takes about a minute before it will let you access the messaging feature. Kinda annoying. And it takes longer than it should to send a text... a couple of seconds each time. Also, it would be nice if text conversations were shown as threaded, but this is a minor concern to me.Worst part of this phone for me is the battery life. I have to charge it every night for several hours. It does not charge quickly, and WORST OF ALL, if the battery is low, the phone will shut off even when it is plugged into the wall. It has done this several times while I was in the middle of a conversation, or when I had it charging at night and was counting on it as my morning alarm. VERY ANNOYING. Also hate how the phone will not let you access any features except talk and text when the battery is low.... you can't access or record pictures, video, audio, etc.I do not use the internet features on this phone, so I can't comment on that.I use this like a regular cell phone, for talk and text, not like a smart phone. Aside from the problems I mentioned, it does the job for me and I like it a lot. I like the look of it, and its not too bulky to fit in the pocket of my tight jeans. The touch-screen works well, display is bright and beautiful. I have no problems using the QWERTY keyboard (but I am a girl so my fingers are small) and it is SO much better than texting with a regular phone keypad. I like the fact it will bluetooth or USB connect to your computer, so its easy to upload pics and music, or use it like a pen drive to transport any type of files. (If you do this, you WILL need to buy a SD card, or you will use all your memory up really fast.) I also like that you can use any recorded or uploaded audio clip as a ring-tone, so there's never a need to buy.I don't know if I would recommend this phone. Its not perfect, but I have never found a phone I have loved 100%. I got mine on ebay for only $60, so for that price I think its worth it.

Reviews.Title: I can't wait to replace it.
Reviews.Author: maddog24
Reviews.Content: When I first looked at it, all of the reviews were great.  It was a great middle of the road smart phone.  Then one-by-one just like mine, the problems started.  I can send/receive about 20 to 30 text messages before it just will not receive or send anymore without shutting down and powering it back up.  This wouldn't be the biggest deal except you don't find out until you try to send one, it doesn't go out, you turn it off then back on, and all the sudden you have 3 text messages in your inbox that wouldn't deliver before.  In addition, I had the completely frustrating screen failure where there is an inch difference between where you touch the screen, and where the phone thinks you touched.  It happens in such a way that you can never reach the menu button, so the phone becomes basically useless for anything but calling out using the slide out keyboard.  The most frustrating thing about this phone is it could be a really good phone, but Samsung refuses to put the effort into sending out a patch to correct it.  I will never own another samsung phone again based on this one, and their lack of support.

Reviews.Title: impression phone
Reviews.Author: dee
Reviews.Content: I love it!...thank you all the nutty things it does ....compared to the strive....its great finding new things and the touch screen..well I love it....anyway thank you again

Reviews.Title: Not that great...
Reviews.Author: SLSavior
Reviews.Content: Okay let me start from the begining...I picked this phone from researching it and at first I loved the phone. The internet wasn't that bad (remember this isn't a high tech smartphone). The texting was okay it sucks that it didn't have threaded messaging like the iphone ect.  The touch isn't that bad and it works fine. Over all, I loved it...at first. I should also mention I am 20 years old so I really use my phone :PHere's the real facts after owning it for a few months:You get sick and tired of this phone and the little glitches get on your nerves after a while. Imagine it like when you go to work and the person keeps leaving paperballs on your table and chairs. At first you think its okay, but after having to clean up after the person you just want to snap and yell at the person.Texting:-The keyboard is slow and you really have to push the keys down or it won't go through.-Everytime you text to many text you have to turn it off and on and wait for a minute to be able to send messages again. This WILL happen. You might think "Oh that's not that bad" after a year you get really impatient especially when you when you have to wait to continue or start a conversation. And, especially when you want to continue an important conversation-The texting lags, if you want to know what I mean you will be messaging real fast after using your qwert keyboard and then you realize your phone can't keep up. Which brings us back to-You really have to push the keys down.Lighting:-The screen isn't that bad. It's really decent. INSIDE.-When you are out in the sunlight you can barely see the screen so you have to go in the darkness in order to get to the screen.Battery:-The battery is lousy-The battery gets worse over time-The standby time is fine, but when you want to use the internet and text the phone will die within four hours.-Not to mention you can only talk on the phone for 3 hours or less before it tells you low battery.Phone Calls:-There's not problem with phone calls besides the obvious fact that has to do with your carrier (mine is at&t;).Internet:-It's not a smart phone so you can't expect everything to go fine, but for a non-smart phone its good.-The internet is fast and decent-You cannot compare this to a smart phone like an iphone or a droid without making this phone look like dustOver allMy plan ends in June and I can't wait to get a droid or iphone. If you can deal with the texting issue and the battery and the internet isn't that great. That's fine.

Reviews.Title: samsung phone
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: awesome as advertised working great  wife loves these phones for their testing ability would buy and recommend this phone to anyone

Reviews.Title: 2nd one just like it
Reviews.Author: George's mom
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd time I purchased this phone. My husband does not want a smart phone and his first one like this finally gave out.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY FROM ORIENT TRADING!!!
Reviews.Author: saynototoxicstuff
Reviews.Content: product was advertised new, but was refurbished...but not really..phone was not screwed together properly, screen was cracked, touchscreen did not work...getting refund

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC PHONE
Reviews.Author: William Camacho "Classic Movie Lover"
Reviews.Content: THIS PHONE IS EVERYTHING THAT YOU WANT JUST LIKE A SMART PHONE WITHOUT HAVING TO PAY FOR THE DATA JUST TO HAVE APPS AS IT HAS EVERYTHING YOU NEED ON A FANTASTIC TOUCH SCREEN WITH AN  ADDED QWERTY BOARD TO BOOT!  UNLOCKED AND INTERNET FRIENDLY, THIS PHONE IS TOPS FOR VOICE CLARITY, SIMPLE USE AND FAST RECHARGE.  BATTERY LIFE IS QUITE GOOD, PICTURES ARE CLEAR AND RESOLUTION EXCELLENT.  HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PHONE AND THE PRICE IS OUTSTANDING!!!!

Reviews.Title: Dont buy this piece anytime
Reviews.Author: Neilesh Chorakhalikar
Reviews.Content: Dont buy this piece anytimei baught for 71$ and its touch screen is gone in like months time. and phone is not impressive it sucks. never ever buyi would say add few more bucks and get good phone.dont buy this

Reviews.Title: The product does not function (was advertised as new). Seller is not responding.
Reviews.Author: ejm
Reviews.Content: This phone was purcahsed as a gift.  When the box was opened it appeared as new.  We soon discovered the battery would not accept a charge.  The seller was contacted through the Amazon 'return an item' option.  The seller contacted us 3 days later stating that they would send a label through the USPS. It has been 17 days and all we can hear are crickets.  If the issue is resolved with a functional (as advertised) product, the review can be revised to reflect the customer service.  This is the 1st poor experience that we have had on Amazon in 7 years.

Reviews.Title: samsung a877
Reviews.Author: reba gower
Reviews.Content: I had one before so I knew what I was getting I really love this phone and the deal went good

Reviews.Title: Samsung A877 unlocked
Reviews.Author: Frederick Y. Lee
Reviews.Content: Just like brand new. I had an original  A877 phone that the keyboard became bad and this one worked perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Strait forward dealing
Reviews.Author: T. Burnett
Reviews.Content: This is a good solid phone with bright and sharp display. We didn't want the expense of going to a G4 network. Great G3 phone.

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware
Reviews.Author: Evette
Reviews.Content: Stay away from refurbished cell phones. My phone worked properly for two weeks after which the battery started to short out causing the phone shut off on it's own.

Reviews.Title: Excelente producto
Reviews.Author: michel palencia
Reviews.Content: Este telefono es muy bueno, compacto y multifuncional se recomienda ampliamente, lo compre desde Valencia Venezuela y lo recibi en el tiempo estimado y con calidad.

Reviews.Title: My Samsung
Reviews.Author: Nordette
Reviews.Content: I love my phone and I realize that samsung is  a good brand phone. I am just tryin to make the operations on it work in Jamaica where I am from.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS PHONE!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have owned phone for more than a yr now. My touchscreen went out and I like this phone enough that I ordered another one. I am extremely hard on cell phones myself and I have 2 lil boys who are equally as rough. This phone was dropped at least 100 times and worked until today 3/14/2011. My oldest child even sent this phone swimming with mop water and this phone still came back on and worked perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Hot Bad For A Teen
Reviews.Author: Jimmy Becca
Reviews.Content: Alot of people complain about this phone, but I liked it. I got bored with it, but it never stopped doing what it's suppose to: text, call, pictures, and occassional games. Mine started screwing up and I had to send it back and get a new one, other than that, the buttons work fine, the phone isn't slow, and I've hacked it and put games on it, so it is very capable.I have pokemon and mario. Pokemon runs fine but Mario is kind of slow.Overall, for a teen who texts his girlfriend 24/7 everyday, it is a good phone that won't wear quick.

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: JMONTES
Reviews.Content: The cell look nice!..but it does not work well at all.There is something wrong with the speackers on the phone;you cannot carry a conversation everything sounds with an echo and static!....very dis-appointed with this product.

Reviews.Title: This product broke in a months time.
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for a friend and less than 30 days it was broke for no apperent reason not wet or droped and due to the 30 day warrenty, I missed being able to return it because I am currently deployed out of the country and was a few days late on knowing about that so now she is stuck with a broken phone. A great way to waist a 100 dollars.

Reviews.Title: I hate this phone.
Reviews.Author: April
Reviews.Content: I had my Impression three months before the touchscreen went bad (it just stopped responding-no matter how hard I pressed). I sent it to Samsung for repairs. Well, it lasted maybe six months before the touchscreen went bad again. No matter how hard I press, I cannot select Menu or Settings. I regret purchasing this phone. I will not purchase a Samsung phone again!

Reviews.Title: Wowwww. Worst phone EVER.
Reviews.Author: Taylorrr,
Reviews.Content: I too am glad to tell people about this phone.The Samsung Impression is probably the single worst phone I have EVER had. The first day I bought it I had to turn in off just to send a text message. And you have to wait about a minute after every time you turn it back on before it will even let you in the messaging menu. Sounds like not that big of a deal, right? Wrong. By the end I had to turn it off after just about every message I sent, to send another one. It is terrible. The touch screen works pretty well, but the keyboard is awful. The lag on the keyboard was terrible. This phone drove me CRAZY. Soooo bad. I would NEVER EVER EVER recommend this to someone. DO NOT EVER BUY THIS PHONE. Lol. Seriously. You will definitely regret it. Trust me, I've known like five people with this phone, and ALL of them had the exact same problem. And I got online when I still had it and there were pages, and pages, and pages of people complaining of the exact same problem.

Reviews.Title: This purchase is a huge disappointment
Reviews.Author: VANEZ
Reviews.Content: Hello---Thank you for the opportunity to survey your productI PURCHASED THE SAMSUNG IMPRESSION SHG-A877--For whatever reason i have to turn the phone off and back on serveral times a day just to send and recieve text messages.  The screen very often just blacks out and turns pink. I have been extremely careful not to drop or otherwise damage the phone since it appears to be very delecate, still it acts as if its been damaged before. I really like the features, but can not access all of them since my local network (in the Bahamas) is saying that i cant get internet on it because it is "locked" by AT&T.; I would not have purchased this phone if this would have been brought to my attention. The amazon ad said UNLOCKED. The back panel of the phone that protects the battery and whatever else is very flimsy and does not click back it place as it should. There is literally a small opening between the phone and the back panel-----that is not good!!!!!!!!Overall, i am very disappointed and would really appreciate someone from your company to address my concerns.Samsung Star GT-S5230 Unlocked PhoneFull Touch Screen Quad Band GSM Bluetooth, 3.2 MP Camera, Voice Record, MP3, MP4 Speaker Phone--U.S. Version with 1 Year Warranty (Black)

Reviews.Title: Samsung Impression
Reviews.Author: Sis
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Samsung Impression about a year ago.  I've not had one problem with this phone until I requested the unlock code from AT&T; and they froze it now it can't be used any where :(But I've never had any issues with it. It always worked for me and never let me down. Now I'm on the hunt for another one.

Reviews.Title: not at all happy
Reviews.Author: Karen D. Weitzel
Reviews.Content: Phone stopped working after 3 weeks. Went black after it froze sending an text message.Will not buy another Samsung as this is not the first phone to freeze with text messages.

Reviews.Title: DOES IT WORK IN SOUTH AMERICA
Reviews.Author: Cambridge International NV "kk"
Reviews.Content: I LIVE IN SURINAME SOUTH AMERICA.I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW IF THIS PHONE WORKS IN MY COUNTRY?BECAUSE I WOULD LIKE TO PURCHASE IT.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
3.2" AMOLED brilliant, widescreen display; Energy Star; PC studio manager
Slide-out QWERTY keyboard; Full messaging capabilities; SMS text and MMS picture/video messaging
3.0-megapixel camera; Customizable widget bar; Voice memo recorder
Bluetooth version 2.0; Digital audio player with support for MP3 and AAC file formats; Speakerphone with mute functions
ProductInfo.Name: Unlocked Samsung Impression A877
